nodes.text: Targis was a male Human Lieutenant of the Imperial Military living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was stationed on Hoth, where he captured a squad of Twi'lek Republic soldiers. He executed one every day in an attempt to bait the Republic into an attack. He was eventually killed by a group of Republic-affiliated individuals in their attempt to free the prisoners.

Captain Targis appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Hoth. He is featured in the description of the Prisoner Extraction heroic mission and can be found in the mission's instanced area. While his death is not required by any of the mission's objectives, this article assumes 100% game completion, which means he is killed.
